website_summaries.verdict: Delivers a consistently strong performance against dark circles.
pros: A no-nonsense product that did what it claimed to do
Its high-quality ingredients also earn high marks
You'll need to apply just a little bit of this eye gel for it to be effective
cons: Burning and breakout reactions to this gel are rare but possible nonetheless

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of Image product line. This cream has helped balance out my lines and dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnyloo

customer_reviews.title: Best natural eye cream ever
customer_reviews.text: Best natural eye cream! I tried about six including cold pressed oils and this one provided a notable plumpness, lift, moisture and felt tight. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: gelkids78

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I get somewhat tight skin under my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I get somewhat tight skin under my eyes after I wash my face and this hydrates it! I can't really tell if it helps with wrinkles so much though but they haven't gotten worse. Also, the tube looks small but you really only use a small amount so it lasts longer than you would think. The last tube I had lasted me about 6 months using it once a day. I will definitely continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: IPG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really works on reducing wrinkles, dark circles and puffiness. Finally!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as many reviews led me to believe. Probably will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Heiser

customer_reviews.title: Total Product not Included
customer_reviews.text: I did not get two I only received one of my order. Another item we did not order was in the bag a replacement pole tip. Please look into it. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me ):
customer_reviews.text: Burned my eyelids. It softened my eyelids but this is not for me because of the burning.
customer_reviews.author: Pats favs

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye cream
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eye cream. Visibly removes small wrinkles and puffiness. I tried many others just because I like trying new things but I keep coming back to this eye cream because it works so great.
customer_reviews.author: Mirasok

customer_reviews.title: I had received a free sample of this product and ...
customer_reviews.text: I had received a free sample of this product and was blown away by how it worked. When I ordered the regular size product, I did not get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says it does. Im happy I will by more :) Lifts up your eyes, like an eye lift.
customer_reviews.author: nan3311

customer_reviews.title: this is an amazing product but I don't understand why the packaging was ...
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing product but I don't understand why the packaging was changed..because now when you squeeze the tube, the cream squirts out the bottom, shooting out all over counter or floor!! What a waste, I reordered and it happened again. Definitely need a better packaging for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joann S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years. It moisturizes the delicate skin around the eye and decreases fine lines and wrinkles
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Rini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little sticky but I love this skin care line. Really high quality products and great, non-toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: holly g

customer_reviews.title: If looking for eye cream go with something stronger
customer_reviews.text: Felt great on eyes but didn't do much in the end
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Juarez

customer_reviews.title: A Little Dab'll Do You
customer_reviews.text: No over-the-top promises; just excellent botanical skincare delivered at a reasonable price. And seriously - you can stretch these products out for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Image Eye Lift
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it 2x daily for 4 weeks and have seen no improvement, either above or below my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda cordes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! So glad that this was introduced to me will use it forever!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele D. Rassey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't care for it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was to help with dark circles under the eye, but it made areas of white sections instead of a uniform look. I quit using it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dieter

customer_reviews.title: Great, but too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Great but is too expensive for such a small bottle. Took at least 3 months to show improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: this may not be your best bet.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Used it twice and then stuffed it in a drawer. If you're over 30 and looking to hydrate and prevent more lines, this may not be your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: OWS

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! If you want to have an OVERNIGHT breakout this is what you need. I've never had a breakout in my life. Not sure if this is a knockout or not I would NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.author: missbprincess

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it now
customer_reviews.text: Well once you have the perfect skin care, you can not go back. This is it for me. I have difficult skin and my facialist turned me onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Good product though does not wear well under makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have used products within the ormedic line for years, with great results, especially with the night creme and lip complex. Eye lift gel does work well also, though I no longer use due it does not wear well under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, not greasy. Very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: I only wish it came in a bigger size, because I go through it rather quick. I like how moisturizing it goes on, and it's not greasy at all. One of my favorite eye creams. The eye cream came in 2 days. I was surprised at how fast it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: JulieM

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really tightens and lifts. Feels great going on. I have been using it at night along with the balancing bio peptide cream
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I give my eyelids a drink of water every time I apply this gel. It's amazing how little you need to use for both eyes.
customer_reviews.author: kbodd

customer_reviews.title: great eye cream
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I've tried - light, creamy and easily absorbed. I love it. The only thing I would change is the tube which you have to squeeze fairly well to get the gel out.
customer_reviews.author: Sasa

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: any image skin care product is going to be good, but the ormedic line is fantastic. i feel like my eyes look much better when i use it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bishop

customer_reviews.title: eye gel
customer_reviews.text: I like this eye gel but it doesn't get rid of puffy eye lids. Any suggestions. I'm still going to keep this on my to get list
customer_reviews.author: Gail Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: I am going to order more. Liked it very much. Soothing to the eye area. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Hollace N. Celmer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye gel! It's the perfect consistency and hydrates my eyes. I don't have dark circles or anything yet, so I use it as a preventative and mostly because my eye area felt dry. It is very soothing and hasn't irritated my skin. As with the rest of the Ormedic line, I love the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product...but the new packaging is awful and wastes it. I've stopped buying because of the packaging. Nothing to do with with product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product works and I am so happy I got it
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

product_meta.title: IMAGE Skincare Ormedic Balancing Eye Lift Gel with SCT, 0.5 oz
product_meta.description:
This cooling gel brings rapid relief to tired, puffy eyes and hydrates delicate skin, relaxes crow’s-feet and reduces the look of dark circles. An advanced neuropeptide complex promotes healthy skin function and helps to strengthen the fragile skin under the eyes. Kombucha, a powerful fermented black tea, firms while enhancing skin’s smoothness and radiance. Plant-derived stem cells are shown to reduce the visible signs of aging and minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Its neuropeptides complex helps to fight signs of aging around the eyes.

BRAND STORY
IMAGE Skincare is a clean and professional line backed by clinical results. Created by an esthetician, formulated by a plastic surgeon, IMAGE is dedicated to helping its customers Age Later.
